person.persName: Lafayette Green (Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer, miller, attorney, and politician)

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer, miller, attorney, and politician. Schuyler County, Illinois, native. Son of Morgan B. Green and Caroline Stone Green. Farmer and miller in Grayson County in the 1850s. Studied law under Joel W. Bickers in Rumsey, Kentucky. Attorney in Grayson County in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1859 to 1861. Member of the Democratic Party.
